1   /**
2    * BSD-style license; for more info see http://pmd.sourceforge.net/license.html
3    */
4   
5   package net.sourceforge.pmd.cache;
6   
7   import java.util.HashMap;
8   import java.util.Map;
9   
10  import net.sourceforge.pmd.Rule;
11  import net.sourceforge.pmd.RuleSets;
12  import net.sourceforge.pmd.annotation.InternalApi;
13  
14  /**
15   * A mapper from rule class names to rule instances for cached rules.
16   *
17   * @deprecated This is internal API, will be hidden with 7.0.0
18   */
19  @Deprecated
20  @InternalApi
21  public class CachedRuleMapper {
22  
23      private final Map<String, Rule> cachedRulesInstances = new HashMap<>();
24  
25      /**
26       * Finds a rule instance for the given rule class name, name and target language
27       * @param className The name of the rule class that generated the cache entry
28       * @param ruleName The name of the rule that generated the cache entry
29       * @param languageName The terse name of the language for which the rule applies
30       * @return The requested rule
31       */
32      public Rule getRuleForClass(final String className, final String ruleName, final String languageName) {
33          return cachedRulesInstances.get(getRuleKey(className, ruleName, languageName));
34      }
35  
36      /**
37       * Initialize the mapper with the given rulesets.
38       * @param rs The rulesets from which to retrieve rules.
39       */
40      public void initialize(final RuleSets rs) {
41          for (final Rule r : rs.getAllRules()) {
42              cachedRulesInstances.put(getRuleKey(r.getRuleClass(), r.getName(), r.getLanguage().getTerseName()), r);
43          }
44      }
45      
46      private String getRuleKey(final String className, final String ruleName, final String languageName) {
47          return className + "$$" + ruleName + "$$" + languageName;
48      }
49  }
